name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Principal-level Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **PHP**, **Java**, **C#**, **.NET**, and **ReactJS**, with a solid foundation in both frontend and backend development utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **AngularJS**. Experienced in building AI-driven solutions and automation frameworks, focusing on observability with tools such as **Grafana**, **Datadog**, and **New Relic**.

Expert in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, and implementing infrastructure as code using **Terraform**. Well-versed in developing compliance-driven applications aligned with industry standards. Strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD methodologies, complemented by a deep understanding of MLOps practices.
